GSD.notes:
I have to assume this is well known, but by request I am entering this info. The router has default creds of admin // password. 

I will be investigating how they are managing the external web app updates to the router to see if the router is exploitable from the internet as well.
GSD.description: In Shaw Communications Inc XB6 Fibre+ Gateway version XB6_0821 a Default Credentials exists in the Router/Modem that can be attacked via local access resulting in Admin access to router

OSV.summary: Default Credentials in XB6 Fibre+ Gateway version XB6_0821
OSV.details: In Shaw Communications Inc XB6 Fibre+ Gateway version XB6_0821 a Default Credentials exists in the Router/Modem that can be attacked via local access resulting in Admin access to router
